synonyms.synonym: PH, SEC7 and coiled-coil domain-containing protein 2

protein.general_function: Involved in ARF guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Promotes guanine-nucleotide exchange on ARF1, ARF3 and ARF6. Promotes the activation of ARF through replacement of GDP with GTP

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of arf protein signal transduction
